A Zezi meng zoe n yeelame t’B yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ? A Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ? Sokre: A Zezi meng zoe n yeelame t’B yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ? A Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ? Leokre: Neb nĩns sen kɩɩsd t’a Zezi ka Wẽnnaama rãmb gomdame t’A meng zɩ n yeel t’B yaa Wẽnnaam ye. Yaa sɩd tɩ Wẽnnaam sebrã ka gʋls t’a Zezi yiisa goam n yeel tɩ, “ Mam yaa Wẽnnaam” ye. La rẽ ka wiligdi, t’a Zezi zɩ n yeel t’A yaa Wẽnnam way. A Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ?— A Zezi meng zoe n yeelame t’B yaa Wẽnnaam. D sãn dɩk makr ne a Zezi goamã Zã 10:30, “Ma
..........
 a zezi yaa Wẽnnaam. A Zezi Karem-biig a Toma yeela Zezi yaa, “Mam Zusoab la mam Wẽnnaam” (Zã 20:28). A Zezi ka kɩɩs-a ye. Tɩt 2:13 keoogda tõnd tɩ d gũ d Zusoabã la d Wẽnnaamã waoongo, a Zezi Kirist (ges-y 2 Piyɛɛre 1:1). Hebre 1:8, Ba wã yeel a Zezi yaa, “La Bãmb yeela B biigâ yaa, ‘fo naam geer na n zĩnda wakat sen kõn sɛ, la fo naam dasaar yaa tɩrlem dasaare.” Ba wã boonda a Zezi tɩ Wẽnnaam, n wiligdẽ t’a Zezi sɩd yaa Wẽnnaam. Wiligr sebrã pʋga, Malɛkã goma ne a Zã n yeel-a t’a waoog Wẽnnaam

A Zezi karen-biig n da kos-a woto: “Zu-soaba, bɩ y zãms tõnd pʋʋsgo.” (Luk 11:1) A Zezi leoorã pʋgẽ, a rɩka makr a yiib n na n wilg tõnd d sẽn segd n pʋʋs to-to tɩ Wẽnnaam kelg-do. Y sã n zoe n soka y meng Wẽnnaam sã n kelgda y pʋʋsg bɩ a pa kelgde, a Zezi sẽn leok a karen-biisã n yeel bũmb ningã tõe n sõng-y lame.—Karm-y Luk 11:5-13. Pipi makrã wilgda sẽn pʋʋsd-a wã manesem sẽn segd n yɩ to-to. (Luk 11:5-8) Kibarã gomda rao sẽn paam sãan yʋn-sʋk yelle. A ra pa tar dɩɩb n na n kõ-a, tɩ ra pak-a.

ʋsgã’ yelle. (Yɩɩl Sõamyã 65:3) A Zezi soka woto: “Ãnda n be yãmb sʋka, a biig sẽn na n kos-a bur t’a rɩk kugr n kõ-a? Wall a sã n kos-a zĩunfu, a na rɩk waaf n kõ-a n ka kõ-a zĩunf bɩ? Wall a sã n kos-a gelle, a na rɩk nang n kõ-a bɩ?” Leoorã yaa vẽenega. Ba kõn sak n kõ a biig bũmb sẽn na n maan-a wẽng ye. A Zezi wilga a makrã võore. Ninsaalbã sẽn pa zems zãngã kõta b kambã “kũun sẽn yaa sõma.” Rẽnd ‘sẽn yɩɩda, tõnd arzãn Ba wã na n kõo neb nins sẽn kot bãmbã Sɩɩg Sõngã’ sẽn yaa kũun sẽn yaa s

Betɛllã zak rãmb tʋmda tʋʋm toor-toor sẽn na yɩl tɩ koɛɛgã mooneg kẽng taoor b tẽngẽ wã, bɩ tẽns a taab me pʋsẽ. Neb kẽer lebgda sɛba, tɩ neb a taab yiisdẽ, tɩ sãnda ningd kartõ rãmb pʋsẽ, tɩ kẽer me get sɛbã bĩngr yelle, tɩ sãnda maand CD la video rãmba, tɩ kẽer me tʋmd tʋʋm a taaba. Betɛll fãa tara sull sẽn get a tʋʋmã yelle. Betɛll fãa pʋgẽ, Siglgã taoor lʋɩtb Sull yãkda kãsem-dãmb a tã bɩ sẽn yɩɩd rẽ, tɩ b get tʋʋm nins b sẽn tʋmd b tẽngẽ wã bɩ tẽns a taab pʋsẽ wã yelle. “Bɩ y togs tõnd . . . bãnd ning sẽn na n wilg yãmb waoongo, la dũniyã sɛɛb wakate.”—MAT. 24:3. 1. Bõe la tʋm-tʋmdbã ra rat n bãng tɩ tõnd me rat n bãnge? A ZEZI tẽng zug tʋʋmdã ra kolga sɛɛbo, t’a karen-biisã ra rat ne b sũy fãa n bãng bũmb nins sẽn na n zĩnd beoog-daarã. Rẽ n so tɩ rasem a wãn nand t’a ki, bãmb b naas kos-a woto: “Bɩ y togs tõnd bõn-kãens sẽn na n zĩnd wakat ninga, la bãnd ning sẽn na n wilg yãmb waoongo, la dũniyã sɛɛb wakate.” (Mat. 24:3; Mark 13:3) A Zezi leokrã pʋgẽ, a togs

n na n kao bʋʋdã yelle. (Karm-y Matɩe 25:31-34, 41, 46.) Sẽn mik t’a Zezi pa sɩng buudã fãa bʋʋd kaoob yʋʋmd 1914, rẽnd pa yʋʋm-kãng la a sɩng ninsaalbã welgr wa pe-kɩɩm sẽn welgd a piis ne a bʋʋs ye. (Ges-y vẽnegr a 3.) La yaa wakat bʋg la bʋ-kaoorã na n sɩnge? 12. a) Wakat bʋg la a Zezi na n sɩng buudã fãa bʋʋd kaoobo? b) Yel-bʋs la b bilg Matɩe 24:30, 31 la sak 25:31-33, 46 pʋgẽ? sull a 8 wã, b sẽn togs yɛl nins Matɩe 24:30, 31 wã kẽer na n zĩnda ziri tũudmã sãoong poore. Malɛgsã yii yɛ? Bãmb b wãn la Wẽnnaam naan-yã? 2 D tog n bao n bãnga sẽn sɩng to-to tɩ malɛgsã wa beẽ. Koloos-rãmb 1: 3. Bõe la Zoob 38: 3 Biiblã wilgame t’a Zeova naana malɛgsã n yaool n naan tẽngã. A sẽn naan tẽngã poore, malɛgsã manesem yɩɩ wãna? Zoob sebrã yeelame tɩ b kaasa ne sũ-noogo. Dẽnd b ra yaa

Waafã yeel-a lame yaa: ‘Yaa sɩd tɩ Wẽnnaam pa rat tɩ y rɩ tɩɩsã fãa biis bɩ?’ T’a Awa leok yaa: ‘Tõnd tõe n dɩɩ tɩɩsã fãa biisi, sã n pa a ye bala. Tõnd sã n dɩ tɩ-kãng bilã, d na n kiime.’ La waafã yeel-a lame yaa: ‘Yãmb pa na n ki ye. Fo miime, yãmb sã n dɩ, y na n lebga wa Wẽnnaam.’ Waafã sẽn yeelã yaa sɩd bɩ? Ayo, yaa ziri. La a Awa ra tẽedame tɩ yaa sɩda. A sẽn da tar tɩɩgã bil gesgã, yamleoogã kẽ-a lame, t’a yãk n dɩ, la a tɩ kõ a Ãdem

GES-Y rao ning sẽn be koomã pʋgẽ wã. Yell n na n paam-a, bala zĩnfã rat n vel-a lame. Yãmb mii raoã bɩ? A yʋʋr la a Zonase. Bɩ d ges bũmb ning sẽn kɩt t’a wa be koomã pʋgẽ wã. A Zonas yaa a Zeova no-rɛɛsa. No-rɛɛs a Eliize kũumã poor bala, a Zeova yeela a Zonas yaa: ‘Yik n kẽng Niniiv sẽn yaa tẽn-kãsengã n tɩ moon n yeel t’a nebã kongame. Bala b wẽnemã yaa wʋsgo.’ La a Zonas ra pa rat n kẽng ye. A zãgsame n yik n kẽ batayo sẽn da pa teesd Niniiv sẽnes meng ye. La a Zeova sũurã pa yɩ noog ne-a ye
..........
. Yãmb mii a sẽn maan bũmb ning a sẽn wa n be zĩnfã pʋgẽ wã bɩ? A pʋʋsa a Zeova n bõos-a t’a sõng-a. A Zeova kɩtame tɩ zĩnfã tɩ wʋk a Zonas koomã noore. Rẽ poore, a Zonas kẽnga Niniivi. Woto wilgda tõnd t’a Zeova sã n yeel tɩ d maan bũmbu, d segd n maaname. Zonas sak a 1 n tɩ tãag a 4. Sogsgo - A Zonas yaa ãnda, la a Zeova yeel-a lame t’a maan bõe? - A Zeova sẽn tʋm a Zonas t’a ra pa rat n kẽngã, a Zonas maana bõe? - A Zonas yeela batayo wã rãmb tɩ b maan bõe tɩ sebgã sigi? - Wala y sẽn ne foto

Koɛɛgã mooneg sasa, d sã n wẽ kʋɩleng tɩ biig pake, d tog n sok-a-la a roagdbã sã n beeme. Woto wilgdame tɩ d nanda b zu-sobendã. (Yel. 6:20) Biigã sã n yeel tɩ d kẽ, d pa tog n sak ye. A roagdbã sã n pa tar sẽk bɩ b sã n yiime, d tog n lebg n waa wakat a to. Baa biigã yʋʋm sã n taa 15 n digd 19, d tog n soka a roagdbã sã n beeme. B sã n ka be bɩ b pa tar sẽka, d tõe n sok-a lame n ges a roagdbã sã n kõ-a-la sor t’a tõe n deeg sebr n yõd n karme. A sã n tara sore, bɩ d kõ-a sebr wall d wilg-a tõnd sitã sẽn yaa jw.org. D sã n lebg n na n tɩ kaag biig sẽn yeel t’a rat n bãng n paasame, d tog n soka a roagdbã yelle, n bao n sõs ne-ba. Rẽ d paamd n wilg-b-la d waoongã võore, la d wilg-b me tɩ Biiblã tara sagls sẽn tõe n sõng zak rãmba. (Yɩɩn. 119:86, 138) D sã n wilg tɩ d waoogda biigã roagdba, na n kɩtame tɩ b pẽg-do, tõeeme me n kõ-d weer tɩ d tõog n moon zakã nebã koɛɛgã.—1 Pɩy. 2:12.

Hay Festival of Literature & Arts, b sẽn boond tɩ Hay Festival (Welsh), yaa sɛb kibs sẽn maand yʋʋm fãa Hay-on-Wye, Powys, Wales, rasem 10 sigr kiuug n tãag sigr kiuugã. A Norman, a Rhoda la a Peter Florence n sɩng kibsã yʋʋmd 1988 wã, la a Bill Clinton yeelame tɩ yaa " Woodstock ning sẽn get yam yelle. " [1] A Tony Benn yeela woto: "Mam yamẽ wã, a rɩka Nowɛll zĩigẽ".[2] A lebga kibs sẽn tar yõod wʋsg Britani wã pʋgẽ, la b gʋlsa tigs nins sẽn zĩnd kibsã pʋgẽ wã televiziõ la radio wã tʋʋm-noy wala a The Readers' and Writers' Roadshow la a The One Show. BBC wã radio rãmb fãa sẽn be tẽng fãa pʋgẽ n ka naag ne Radio One wã ra tara tʋʋm sẽn kẽed ne kibsã, la Sky Arts wilga kibsã yɛl nins sẽn yɩ kãsenga yʋʋm 2010 n tãag 2013, n dɩk pipi kibsã kibsã n kõ BBC yʋʋm 2014 soabã.[3]

Sa-sik kiuug rasem a yiibu yʋʋm 2020 soabã pʋgẽ, Ekoall Sõmgãande reega lagem-n-taar sula ka tɛk sẽn teend MPP pagtɩ wã Arõndiisma limor a naas pʋg Waogdgo. Yaa tãb-biisi ka tɛk sẽn lagem-n-taar sula pʋse, pag la rap n yi Arõndiisma wã wen-vɩɩs a naasã fãa pʋgẽ, n yek taab Ekoall Sõmgãande sẽn be Tukẽ yaarã sɛɛgẽ n na n wilg b belem ne tẽngã taoor soaba a Rok Mark Kiristẽ KABOORE, tɩ b be a poorẽ wĩndg la yʋngo, n teend-a a na-baoorã wɛɛngẽ, la b yãagd tẽng gãand bãanã rãmb tɩ b paam tõogre, n d
..........
gẽ. Pagbã yiib wilgda b sũur belem, t’a rat tɩ b rɩk a koeesã n taas MPP taoor rãmbã ne b poorẽ dãmba . Arõndiisma 4 Meer kʋdre, a Zakrya SAWADG tʋma ned a yʋʋr yĩnga. Nin-kãng soabã pẽgame la a wilg tɩ zãma wã sẽn sak n yi woto wã wilgda b sũ-noog ne MPP. Tʋʋmdã ma yãkdga depite Izabɛl Wedraoog wilgame tɩ pabgã yiib sɩd kõta kaset tɩ MPP na n le paama naamã. A pẽgame la a wilg tɩ wakat fãa, b sã n tar a raabo, a na n saka b boollã n kell n yãag-ba. Pẽgdwẽnde Eric Zĩnaaba Une quarantaine d’assoc

A Zezi kii sẽn na yɩl tɩ tõnd paam n vɩɩmde. Zã 3:16 Rasem a tãab a Zezi kũumã poore, pagb n kẽng yaoogẽ wã n tɩ mik tɩ yaa vɩʋʋgo. A Zeova vʋʋga a Zezi. A Zezi vʋʋgrã poore, a puka a meng t’a tʋm-tʋmdbã yã-a. A Zeova vʋʋga a Zezi t’a le lebg malɛk sẽn tar tõog wʋsgo, n pa na n tol n ki ye. A Zezi karen-biisã yã-a-la a sẽn wa n dʋʋd saasẽ wã. Wẽnnaam vʋʋga a Zezi n kɩt t’a lebg a Rĩungã rĩma. Daniɛll 7:13, 14 A Zezi sak n kiime tɩ yɩ rond ãdem-biisã yĩnga. (Matɩe 20:28) Rondã yĩnga, Wẽnnaam sakame tɩ tõnd tõe n wa vɩɩmd wakat sẽn kõn sa. A Zeova kɩtame t’a Zezi lebg rĩma, n na n dɩ naam tẽngã gill zugu. Wẽn-sakdb 144000 la b na n vʋʋg tɩ b kẽng saasẽ. Yaa a Zezi ne nin-kãensã 144000 n na n naag taab n dɩ naam Wẽnnaam Rĩungã sẽn yaa tɩrlem goosneemã pʋgẽ.—Wilgri 14:1-3. Wẽnnaam Rĩungã na n kɩtame tɩ tẽngã lebg arzãna. Zabã, tʋʋm-beed toor-toorã, naongã la komã na n saame. Nebã na n paama sũ-noog hakɩka.—Yɩɩl Sõamyã 145:16.

Yaa ne nasaara nug-tʋʋm-te-paalle, b sẽn boond tɩ Buluma « Bloom » zãmsgo. Bulum yaa tʋʋmd teoogo, b sẽn tara n maan

 Zĩnaaba Les écrivains en langues nationales ont bénéficié d’une formation sur le logiciel Bloom En Afrique et dans le monde entier, les écrivains en langues nationales rencontraient d’énormes difficultés pour la parution de leurs oeuvres. C’est ainsi que du 18 au 21 février 2019, l’association ADEA et l’USAID ont procédé à une formation des écrivains en langues nationales sur un logiciel nommé Bloom. C’est un instrument utilisé pour faire le montage des différents romans. À travers cette format

Yaa Wẽnnaam Rĩungã bal n yaa ãdem-biisã zu-loees tɩɩm. A Zezi kell n goma Rĩungã yell n tãag a kũumã. (Luk 4:43; 8:1; 23:42, 43) A yeelame t’a karen-biisã na n moona Rĩungã koɛɛgã. Sõngr sẽn yaa zaalem n yit Wikipedia pʋgẽ Kwaku Afriyie ya Ghana politik ned, koaada ni ned sẽn be New Patriotic party Ghana pugin. A ra ya nen-taoore Region Minisri Ghana yʋʋm 2017 hali ni yʋʋm 2018.[1]Ti perizidã Nana Addo Danquah A Kuffo-Addo yanka yʋʋm- vẽkr kiuugu yʋʋm 2017 ti depite rãmb soog sake koin.[2] Kwaku Afriyie roga yʋʋm- vẽkr kiuugu rasma 7 yʋʋm 1954 tẽng yʋʋre boond Sefwi Wiawso , a ra taara.MBCBH sẽn yi University Ghana Logtoeeme lekolle ni Master Public laafɩ sẽn yi Tulane University, Physicians ni Surgeons poore.[3]

A sã n da yi zabr n watẽ fãa, pagbã yitame n saoodẽ la b yɩɩndẽ n yetẽ tɩ: ‘A Sayull kʋʋ neb tusri, t’a Davɩɩd kʋ tus piiga.’ A Sayull sẽn wʋm rẽ, a maana sũ-kiiri, n baood n na n kʋ a Davɩɩde. Wikipedia sẽn yaa sɛb sẽn pa tar yõodã pʋgẽ Chakkirako (Japanese: チャッキラコ) yaa reem b sẽn maand Miura, Zapõ, sẽn na yɩl n maan yʋʋm-paalã kibs la b wa ne sũ-noog wʋsgo, sẽn yɩɩd fãa, zĩm yõg wɛɛngẽ.[1] Yʋʋmd 2009 soabã pʋgẽ, b gʋls-a-la UNESCO sẽn boond tɩ " Patrimoine culturel immatériel de l'humanité " wã pʋgẽ. Yʋʋmd 1976 wã, Zapõ goosneema wã reega we-rũngã tɩ yaa bũmb sẽn tar yõod wʋsg la b segd n kogl-a.[2] B sẽn sɩng n maand we-rũngã yaa Edõ wakatẽ wã, la yaa we-rũngã neb sẽn da wat n be be wã n kɩt tɩ b maan we-rũngã.[3] Yʋʋm kob-gĩnd piig la a nii wã sʋka, a lebga zĩig b sẽn tõe n wilg b pagbã sẽn be be wã. Yʋʋmd fãa, yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug sʋka, kom-pugli piig n tɩ ta pis-yopoe sẽn tar kimono wã sẽn tar yʋʋma 5 n tɩ tãag 12 maanda we-rũngã wẽnd-doogẽ wã bɩ rot taoorã. Pagb a nu bɩ piig sẽn kʋʋl n naag-ba, n yɩɩnd a capella. - Official website of the dance and festival - Chakkirako on YouTube (UNESCO video)

Biiblã sẽn yete A Zeezi ra pa nin-sõng bal ye. D tõe n yeela koɛɛg-koɛɛg bal t’a yɩɩ nin-kãseng sẽn ka to. Ad kʋdemd yel-mitb la bãngdb yʋy sẽn yi sẽn yeel a Zeezi zugu: “ Hal pĩnd wẽndẽ n tãag masã, Nazarɛt rao a Zeezi n yaa nin-”—Ãngeletɛɛr kʋdemd yel-mit a H. G. Wells.kãseng sẽn ka to. “ Hal pĩnd wẽndẽ n tãag masã, a Zeezi vɩɩmã talla pãng nebã zutu, n ket n tar pãng n paasdẽ.”—Amerik kʋdemd yel-mit a Kenneth Scott Latourette. Biiblã wilgda bũmb ning sẽn kɩt t’a Zeezi yaa kãseng n yɩɩd nin-sõng buud fãa sẽn zĩnd tẽng zugã. A Zeezi sẽn sok a tʋm-tʋmdbã n na n bãng b sẽn tagsd tɩ yẽ yaa ned ningã, b nin-yend leokame n yeele: “Yãmb yaa Kiristã, Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ wã Bi-ribla. ”—Matye 16:16.

Tõe tɩ y zoe n soka y meng woto: ‘Wẽnnaam sã n mii bũmba fãa, hal baa mam tagsa wã menga, bõe yĩng tɩ m segd n pʋʋsdẽ?’ Sokrã zemsame. Sɩd me, a Zezi ra yeelame tɩ Wẽnnaam ‘mii tõnd sẽn datã tɩ tõnd nan ka kos’ ye. (Matɩe 6:8) A Davɩɩd sẽn yɩ Israyɛll rĩmã me yeela woto: “Goam sẽn nan ka ta mam zɩlemdẽ, Zu-soaba, gese, yãmb deng n bãng-a-la zãnga.” (Yɩɩl Sõamyã 139:4) Sẽn yaa woto wã, bõe yĩng masã tɩ d segd n pʋʋsd Wẽnnaam? Film-kãnga pʋga, a Zeezi ne neb a taabã gomda moore. Yaa Burkina neb koees la sẽn dɩk n gãneg filmã pʋgã. Filmã kaoosda lɛɛr a yiibu. Ka wã, yãmb tõe n ges filmã sẽn kʋrs kʋrse wall y mok filim kãngã sẽn yaa wokã begs-begsã. Ẽntɛrnetã pãngã sã n ka waoogẽ, bɩ y yãk sõmblem sẽn zems balã. Filim-kãngã yaa tɩʋʋsg sõng zãng sẽn wilgd a Zeezi sẽn tũud ne Koe-noog a Luk sẽn gʋlsã. A Zeezi lingda nebã la b ningd-b yãnd wakat fãa, ne bãmb rogmã sẽn bõn-bãndã hal tɩ ta bãmb sẽn vʋʋg n bas kũumã la b arzãn dʋʋbã. Bɩ y ges bãmb vɩɩmã sẽn tũud ne a Luk sebrã koeese, bõn-bãnã fãa, zãmsgã la namsgã fãa.

A Zeezi tog n keta Samaari bɩ Galɩle. Fariizẽ-rãmbã sok-a lame n na n bãng Wẽnnaam soolmã sẽn na n wa wakat ninga. Bãmb tẽedame tɩ na n yɩɩ kibs-kẽenga. La a Zeezi yeel-b lame yaa: “Wẽnnaam soolmã ka wate, n yaa wa bũmb ned sẽn tõe n gẽnes ye. B ka na n yeel tɩ ges-y-yã! Wẽnnaam soolem bee ka wall a bee ka sẽnẽ ye. Bala, ad-y Wẽnnaam soolmã bee yãmb sʋka.”—Luk 17:20, 21. Kẽer tõe n tagsame t’a Zeezi gomdã rat n yeelame tɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã bee neb nins sẽn tũud Wẽnnaamã sũyẽ. La pa woto ye. Bala ya

Shiraz tãpã (Persian) yaa Pɛrs tãpã buud b sẽn maand tẽn-bõoneg sẽn pẽ Shiraz tẽnga, Irã Fars provense. Zĩis nins b sẽn maandã nong n yaa buud sẽn da beẽ wã sẽn da minim n maand fu-rɩtba, n dɩkd Kaskaayi, Kamsɛɛ (Basseri la Kamsɛɛ araab rãmba), Afsaar, Abada la Luri wã. Sẽn mik tɩ fu-rɩtbã sẽn da tʋmd ne gãn-tõaagã, fu-rɩtbã ra nong n yaa kãsenga, la naoor wʋsgo, b ra nong n yaa zɛɛg n yɩɩd b buudã. A Shiraz rɩkda Pɛrs (asymétrique) bãndã. A Sirus wed-pɛɛlgã bee sɛb kẽer pʋsẽ. Yaa Shiraz tãpã bal la b sẽn maan tɩ b tõe n yã wã, tɩ b mak-a wa bõn-yɩgdɩ. B yetame tɩ bõn-kãensã makda sũ-noog la sũ-noogo. Bãngdb kẽer yeelame tɩ b sã n da na n maan bũmb n na n wilg tɩ b tara yam, b na n tõog n maana b sẽn datã. B sẽn boond tɩ orange wã yaa a Basseri tãpẽ wã.[1]

A Sayull n yɩ Israɛll pipi rĩma. La a Zeova wa n bas-a lame n yãk a Davɩɩd t’a ledg-a. D na n goma a Davɩɩd yell wʋsgo. A sẽn wa n yaa bi-bɩɩga, a zaba ne nin-wobg a Goliate. Kaoosg zugẽ, a wa n zoeeme, bala rĩm a Sayull da maanda sũ-kiir ne-a. Pʋg-sõng a Abigayill me kɩtame t’a pa maan wẽng ye. Rẽ poore, d na n goma a Davɩɩd biig a Salomo yelle. A Davɩɩd kũumã poore, a Salomo n lebg Israɛll rĩma. A Sayull rɩɩ a naamã yʋʋm 40, a Davɩɩd ne a Salomo me yɩɩ woto. A Salomo kũumã poore, Israɛll soolmã welga zĩis a yiibu. A yembr bee rɩtg t’a ye be goabga. Rɩtg soabã yaa buud piiga, tɩ goabg soabã yaa buud a yiibu. Rɩtg soabã kaoosa yʋʋm kobs-yi la pis-nu la a yopoe tɩ Asiri nebã yaool n wa sãam-a. Yʋʋm koabg la pis-tã la a tãab poore, b sãama goabg soabã me. Wakat kãnga, b talla Israɛll nebã n kẽng yembd Babilon. Dẽnd babg a naasã gomda yel-kãsems sẽn zĩnd yʋʋm kobs-nu la piig pʋgẽ yelle.

Chamamé (Guarani: party, disorder) yaa Argentinia tʋʋr-soakgẽng la Argentine Mesopotamia buud-goam a ye. [1][2] Chamamé yaa mizik buud sẽn yaa buud sẽn yaa toor ne buud ning sẽn be Zu-soab Amerɩka soolmẽ wã, wa Paraguay la Uruguay. RĨM a Nebukadnezaar wa n talla Israɛll neb nins fãa sẽn karem n zãagã n kẽng Babilon. Rẽ poore, a tũusa kom-bɩɩs nins sẽn da be nin-kãens sʋk n yaa rasãmb la b tar yamã. Kom-dibli a naas nins yãmb sẽn ne fotã zugã bee b sẽn tũus-b rãmbã sʋka. A ye yʋʋr la a Daniɛlle, la Babilon nebã pʋda a tãabã tɩ Sadrak, Mesak la Abɛdnego. A Nebukadnezaar kɩtame tɩ b na n zãms kom-dibli wã na-zakẽ wã tʋʋm yʋʋm a tãabo. Zãmsgã poore, a na n yãka neb nins sẽn tar yam n yɩɩdã tɩ b sõngd-a n welgd a soolmã zu-loee

A Abdul-Rashid Hassan Pelpuo yaa Gana politik soab. A yaa tẽnga taoor soab sẽn be Wa Central wã sẽn be Ganaa sẽn be Upper West soolmẽ wã. A rogame yʋʋmd 1964 kiuug rasem 5 daarã, la a yita Wa sẽn be Ganaa sẽn be Upper West soolmẽ wã. A paama a lekollã sẽn yi yʋʋm 1976. A paama a O levelã me yʋʋmd 1983 la a A levelã me yʋʋm 1986. A paama b diplôme wã yʋʋmd 1994 wã, la a paama a diplôme wã yʋʋm 1994. A paama me magister a yembr yʋʋmd 1998 wã pʋgẽ. A paama PhD ne paasg politikã sẽn kẽed ne Ghana Yu

A Moiiz yiisa Israɛll nebã Ezipt n tall-b n kẽng Sinayi tãngẽ wã. Yaa be la Wẽnnaam kõ-b a noyã. Rẽ poore, a Moiiz tʋma rap 12 tɩ b na n tɩ ges Kanaã tẽngã. La rap 10 n lebg n wa gom goam sẽn yɛɛs nebã tɩ b ra rat n leb Ezipti. Israɛll nebã sẽn pa tẽ Wẽnnaamã yĩnga, a kɩtame tɩ b yeeb rasempʋɩɩgã pʋgẽ yʋʋm 40. Wẽnnaam wa n yãka a Zozue t’a na n lʋɩ Israɛll nebã taoor tɩ b kẽ Kanaã tẽngã pʋgẽ. A Zeova maana yel-soalem n sõng-b tɩ b reeg tẽngã. A kɩtame tɩ Zʋrdẽ kʋɩlgã koom yalse, la a kɩt tɩ Zeriko lalsã me lʋɩ, la a kɩt me tɩ wĩntoogã yals raar a ye tõre. Yʋʋm a yoob poore, Israɛll nebã tõog n deega Kanaã tẽngã. Sẽn sɩng ne a Zozue, bʋ-kaoodb n lʋɩ Israɛll nebã taoor yʋʋm kobs-tã la pis-nu la a yoob pʋgẽ. D na n goma bãmb wʋsg yelle. Wala makre, a Barake, a Zedeõ, a Zɛfte, a Samsõ la a Sãmwɛlle. D na n goma pagb kẽer me yelle, wala a Rahaabe, a Debora, a Zayɛlle, a Ruti, a Naomi la a Dalila. Yaa yʋʋm kobs-tã la pis-wɛ la a yoob pʋgẽ la yɛl nins b sẽn togs babg a tãabã pʋgẽ wã maan-yã.

“Bɩ y paam nonglem wʋsg yãmb sʋka, tɩ bõe, nonglem luta yel-wẽn wʋsgo.”—1 Pɩɛɛr 4:8. Bãng-y tɩ y sẽn kẽ kãadmã, zu-loees pa tõe n pa zĩnd ye. Tõe tɩ yaa y tagsgã ne y yel-manesmã sẽn yaa toore, tɩ y wubrã me pa yembrã yĩnga. Wakat ninga, zu-loeesã yita kɛɛnga. Tõe n yɩɩ yel-lingdem me. Ninã tõe n wa tagsdame t’a sẽn maand wa yell kae n são. La Biiblã sagenda tõnd tɩ d maan d sẽn tõe n welg zu-loeesã. Biiblã sẽn yete Biiblã pa gɩdg pag ne rao lageng ye. A wilgame meng tɩ yaa kũun Wẽnnaam sẽn kõt sẽn kẽ-b kãadmã. Hal sɩngrẽ, Wẽnnaam naana “pag ne raoa.” Biiblã yetame tɩ “Wẽnnaam yãndame tɩ bũmb nins fãa bãmb sẽn naanã sɩd yaa sõama hal wʋsgo.” (Sɩngre 1:27, 31) Wẽnnaam talla pagã n wa kõ raoã, n kẽes-b kãadem, n yeel tɩ b yiibã “na n lebga yĩng a yembre.” (Sɩngre 2:24) Dẽnd b ra tõe n kẽe ne taaba. Mam pa tõe n mak m meng ne a Moiiz, a Zedeõ bɩ a Davɩɩd ye.’ Yaa sɩd tɩ Biiblã pʋgẽ, b wilgda tẽn-kʋdem wẽndẽ rap sẽn yɩ tẽedb hakɩk sẽn tʋm tʋʋm-kãsems ne tẽebo. ‘B tõoga soolem wʋsgo, b paga gɩgma noyã, b sãama bugum pãnga, la b põs sʋʋg noore.’ (Hebre dãmba 11

n tũu Wẽnnaam n kaoos sẽn yɩɩd yʋʋm 300 pʋgẽ. Tõnd ned ba a yembr nan pa tall sũ-mar kɩs-sɩd pʋgẽ tɩ kaoos woto ye. La a Enok kell n tũu Wẽnnaam a yõor tɛka.—Sɩngre 5:23, 24. Wala a Enoke, b tʋma tõnd me tɩ d tɩ moone. (Matɩe 24:14) Kasetã kũun zak-zakã toor sẽn ka be, d maoodame n na n taas koe-noogã d roagdba, d tʋmd-n-taas la d karen-bi-taase. Y SẼN TÕE N MAAN TO-TO: Y goamã tog n yita y sũurẽ. Y sã n wa segend y sõsgã, tags-y koɛɛg ning y sẽn dat n taasã yõod sẽn ta zĩig ningã zugu. Bao-y n bãng-y bũmb ning y sẽn na n yeelã sõma. Rẽ, nebã na n yãame tɩ y goamã yita y sũurẽ. Tags-y kɛlgdbã yelle. Tags-y bũmb ning y sẽn na n yeelã sẽn na n naf neb a taabã to-to wã. Bao-y n bãng-y y sẽn na n togs rẽ to-to tɩ naf-ba. Y sõsgã sasa, ra maan-y laas-laas ye. Gom-y ne yẽesem. Y sẽn bilsd ne y nusã to-to wã la y nengã tog n wilga y tagsg sẽn yaa a soab koɛɛg ning y sẽn taasdã zugu.

Yaa Ghana karẽn-biis sẽn be Akra, Gana. Yaa Ghana sẽn yaa tẽng zug karẽn-biis sẽn yaa kãsenga. mos_Latnmos_Latnmos_Latn be be Yaa yʋʋmd 1948 la b lugl-a tɩ yaa Zĩig Koɛɛg Koɛɛg (University College of the Gold Coast) sẽn be Zĩigkoɛɛg Koẽg soolmã pʋgẽ. Sɩngrẽ wã, yaa Londr Inivèsite kolɛj sẽn yaa a taaba, [1] sẽn get a karen-biis programã yelle, la a kõt b diplɩmsã. Guosa yaa buud-gomd sẽn naan ne taaba, a Alex Igbineweka n naan-a yʋʋmd 1965. B sẽn maan-a wã yaa sẽn na yɩl t'a yɩ Nizɛɛr buud-goam nins b sẽn gomd tẽngã pʋgẽ wã lagem-n-taar buud-gomde, la a yɩ buud-gomd b sẽn gomd Afirikdisiid tẽns pʋsẽ. A tara zʋg-sõma kãensã: - Yaa buud-gomd sẽn welg-a toore, tɩ gom-biis nins b sẽn boond tɩ subject-verb-object sõssã sẽn pʋgdã yaa toor-toore. - B pa tar sõss ye. - B pa tar gom-biis la yʋy sẽn yaa toor-toore ye. - Gom-biis wʋsg sẽn tar võor ne gom-biis a taabã yaa gom-biis sẽn dengd gom-biis nins b sẽn toeemdã. - B sã n wa gʋls gom-biis n na n pʋgl yʋ-peellã, b lebgda yʋ-peellã. - Guosa wã yaa gom-vɩɩd sẽn wilgd bũmb ning sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã.

D waoog a Zezi sẽn yaa Davɩɩd-kãseng la Salomo-kãsengã “Gese, sẽn yɩɩd a Salomo bee ka.”—MAT. 12:42. 1, 2. Bõe yĩng tɩ nebã ra pa tõe n tẽ tɩ yaa a Davɩɩd la a Zeova na n kɩt t’a Sãmwɛll zae t’a wa lebg rĩmã? B SẼN wa n na n zae a Davɩɩd t’a wa lebg rĩmã t’a ra yaa biiga, n kɩɩmd piisi. A Sãmwɛll meng ra pa tagsd t’a Zeova na n yãka a Davɩɩd t’a wa lebg rĩm ye. Sẽn paase, Betlehɛm sẽn da yaa a Davɩɩd ba-yirã ra yaa tẽn-bila. Biiblã yetame tɩ Betlehɛm nebã yaa “buud sẽn yaa bilf Zida buudã sʋka.”

1Na'ayenɛ, n diŋdoma wa zo'e mɛ! Ba lɛ n ihege zɛ' a te ba zabɛ la ma. 2Ba zo'e zo'e tɔgɔre mam yeti, Yenɛ kan fan' en. 3Ge hom Na'ayenɛ n de mam tɛ'ɛlega, kae mam mum. Hom n ka'are som bahera mam zuo na, ge zɛnkera mam zuo. 4Mam kaahere bɔ'ɔra la hom Na'ayenɛ wa. A wan bɔna a mɛŋa zoore la zuo, ge lebehe bo mam na. 5N gan'arɛ ginhe ge le ihege soŋa. Se'ere n sɔe la, Na'ayenɛ la n gure mam. 6N kan zɔ tuha pia pia wa n kae mam mum zen'an woo te ba zabɛ la mam wa. 7Na'ayenɛ, ihege saazuo Yenɛ, fan' mam. Wɔnrɛ n diŋdoma wa kareyɛɛhe. Kɔ' potɔpa wa nyɛna. 8Faanrɛ ze'ele la Na'ayenɛ la zen'an na. Ho kan' somɔ wan bɔna ho nɛreba zuo.
